title: Arsenal’s Vivianne Miedema hits four in Champions League win at Slavia Prague
text:
• Kim Little scores penalty before two late Prague goals • Glasgow City and champions Lyon notch victories

Arsenal’s Vivianne Miedema hits four in Champions League win at Slavia Prague

Vivianne Miedema hit four goals in a 5-2 win at Slavia Prague to put Arsenal on the verge of the Women’s Champions League quarter-finals.

The Netherlands striker had a hat-trick inside 39 minutes and added a fourth after half-time.

Charly Corral gives Atlético Madrid upper hand against Manchester City Read more

Kim Little’s penalty made it 5-0 before Katerina Svitkova and Mia Persson cut Arsenal’s lead with late goals.

Glasgow City won 2-0 at Brøndby while Lyon, the European champions, won 4-0 at Fortuna Hjørring with Ada Hegerberg and Eugénie Le Sommer both scoring twice.

Bayern Munich scored five without reply at BIIK Kazygurt while Wolfsburg hit FC Twente for six.
description: Vivianne Miedema hit four goals in a 5-2 win at Slavia Prague to put Arsenal on the verge of the Women’s Champions League quarter-finals
